text:
6
Corporation welcomes this expression of intent and urges
the Commission to emphasize, upon the final issuance of this rule
its preliminary character, the fact that the Commission in no way
considers the promulgation of this rule to be the performance of
its much greater responsibilities under the Act and the public
interest, and that after a proper period of experimentation
with this rule in effect, the Commission will address directly
the problem of free or reduced rates for interconnection for
public broadcasting.
Respectfully submitted
CORPORATION FOR PUBLIC
BROADCASTING
By
